synopsis.text:
Class es are in session at a magical academy nestled on a floating island in the sky, where students compete for prestige and magical stones. Ruquia and her friends find themselves at the bottom of the ranks, struggling to keep up and on the brink of failure. Their one shot at redemption lies in the Class Crash Magical Competition, an interclass group magic battle that could turn their fortunes around.

However, their clumsy antics and lackluster performance may prove to be their downfall. With the pressure on and their academic future hanging in the balance, can this band of underachievers rise to the challenge and prove their worth in a dazzling display of magical prowess? Only time will tell in this enchanting OVA.
